channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP (SAP GUI for HTML within the Fiori Launchpad)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP (SAP GUI for HTML within the Fiori Launchpad)

item.title: CVE-2022-39799|2024-08-03T12:07:41.955Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20as%20abap%20%28sap%20gui%20for%20html%20within%20the%20fiori%20launchpad%29
item.description: An attacker with no prior authentication could craft and send malicious script to SAP GUI for HTML within Fiori Launchpad, resulting in reflected cross-site scripting attack. This could lead to stealing session information and impersonating the affected user.
